name: cancerMode
description: Point of rotation for each piece is wrong

name: placeOnMoveDown
description: Moving a block down while unable to, will place the block

name: playerDownFrameDelay
description: Number of frames until pieces move down after rotation

name: keyPressFrameDelay
description: Number of frames until piece continues to move after first key press

name: framesPerKeyHandle
description: Number of frames after which key events are hanndled

name: timePerDownMoveMillis
description: Interval in miliseconds between tetris down-falls

name: moveRightOnSpawn
description: Number of tiles to move piecs to the right upon spawn
